Authors:
Seong Bum Park, Jong Yun Kim, Jung Yeon Han, Yong Eui
Choi
Title:
Transcriptomic analysis of Populus dividiana to seek genes
involved in benzenoid biosynthesis
Keywords:
Benzenoid biosynthesis, transcriptome analysis, de novo
sequencing, next-generation sequencing, Populus dividiana
Abstract:
Background: Willows and poplars, members of the Salicaceae
family, typically accumulate large amounts of phenolic compounds,
including benzenoids and salicinoids. P. dividiana is called the Korean
aspen and grows in Northeast Asia. No transcriptomic analyses of P.
dividiana have been performed.
